docs.snippet: Leaders of the leftist Podemos party once advised the government of Hugo Chávez in Venezuela, a country whose economic collapse is an issue in national elections next Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leaders of the leftist Podemos party once advised the government of Hugo Chávez in Venezuela, a country whose economic collapse is an issue in national elections next Sunday.
docs.abstract: Memo from Spain; Spain's governing conservative party, wary of growing allure of left-wing group Podemos, meets with opponents of Venezuela's leftist government; seeks to portray Venezuela's chaotic economy as harbinger of Spain's if leftists win in upcoming national elections.

headline.main: Venezuela Casts a Long Shadow on Elections in Spain
headline.print_headline: Campaign Against Leftists Points to National Troubles: Venezuela’s

docs.abstract: Anti-establishment candidate Virginia Raggi is elected first woman mayor of Rome, in political setback for Italian Prime Min Matteo Renzi.

headline.main: Virginia Raggi of Five Star Movement Sweeps Election for Rome’s Mayor
headline.print_headline: ‘New Era Begins’ as Romans Elect Anti-Establishment Mayor

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and ELISABETTA POVOLEDO

docs.snippet: Virginia Raggi, an anti-establishment newcomer who will be the city’s first female mayor, easily claimed a runoff victory amid anger about corruption and deteriorating city services....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Raggi, an anti-establishment newcomer who will be the city’s first female mayor, easily claimed a runoff victory amid anger about corruption and deteriorating city services.
docs.abstract: Virginia Raggi is elected first female mayor of Rome; anti-establishment newcomer defeats Democratic rival by 2-to-1 ratio.

headline.main: Virginia Raggi of Five Star Movement Wins Rome Mayoral Race
headline.print_headline: Woman Elected Mayor of Rome Over Rival Backed by Premier

docs.snippet: If they vote to depart the bloc, the British should expect an unforgiving response from Brussels, which is wary of other nations following suit....
docs.lead_paragraph: If they vote to depart the bloc, the British should expect an unforgiving response from Brussels, which is wary of other nations following suit.
docs.abstract: European officials warn that European Union will punish Britain if it votes to secede from EU; hope to deter other countries from doing same in light of looming economic, financial and security repercussions.

headline.main: E.U. Countries Warn Britain on ‘Brexit’: You’ll Pay if You Leave Us
headline.print_headline: E.U. Countries Warn Britain Ahead of Vote: You’ll Pay if You Leave Us

docs.snippet: German exports will grow less than expected this year due to external risks, including a British exit from the European Union and uncertainties ahead of elections in the United States and France, the head of the BGA trade association said on Monda...
docs.lead_paragraph: German exports will grow less than expected this year due to external risks, including a British exit from the European Union and uncertainties ahead of elections in the United States and France, the head of the BGA trade association said on Monday.

headline.main: German Trade Body Lowers Export Forecast-'Brexit Is Poison'
